answer: Notifications keep you updated on your progress and on the latest announcements from your programme(s). You can find them at the top right of your screen. It’s the icon that looks like a Bell 🔔.
answer_formatted: Notifications keep you updated on your progress and on the latest announcements from your programme(s). You can find them at the top right of your screen. It’s the icon that looks like a Bell 🔔.
question: How do I get updates on learning programmes?
